title: Warden Sivir and Nautilus Fan Art

embed.description: The upcoming skins for Sivir and Nautilus!

body: Once again great job to the skin team for these amazing skins!

replies.body: :o You completed the sets! This looks just as awesome as the Marauder ones! :D

Thank you! The Wardens were definitely  harder to do, Naut was a huge challenge.

Glad you like it
So is it correct to assume that these skins for {{champion:111}}  and {{champion:15}}  embody the idea of the ultimate/divine shield and sword combination?
I sure as hell can for you! :D
The art is amazing! And I definitely have to hand it to Riot, they did a good job on these skins.
Wait, Warden {{champion:111}}  is going to be added?
No one escapes from the terror of the deep!
Leaves me tears in my eyes XD. Only wish RiotXypherous was here to see this :( He would be proud.
Oh wow, I love your art style!
